website_summaries.verdict: Affordable gaming rig with the parts necessary for a quality VR experience.
pros: Computer comes with powerful GTX 1050 Ti graphics card for high-resolution VR
CPU is fast enough for most VR needs with little lag in performance
cons: Included wireless adapter is only capable of connecting to 2.4 GHz networks

customer_reviews.title: Horrible company
customer_reviews.text: Product defective! Worked for a few hours then proceeded to have fatal errors which locked the computer up. We had this pc overnighted due to kids needing a pc for school work. Skynet refused to rectify the situation by overnighting the replacement! Horrible customer service! Don’t be a sucker like I was. I’d give 0 stars if I were able to score that low!
customer_reviews.author: john byrne

customer_reviews.title: Blue Eyes White Dragon PC GREAT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, boots fast. Husband is currently benching it but hasn't got any snags so far. Two items of note, discrepancies between Amazon description and actual spec. Includes aftermarket cooler, which is probably better than stock, but motherboard model is different and does not have an M2 slot. Does have a spare PCIE slot so a cheap adapter should fix that. Also, super props for including a (nice) mouse and keyboard!
customer_reviews.author: Poogie

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: Have only had it for a couple days, but can help with deciding what to get. The graphics card, great! No complaints with the 1050ti. The processor, actually better than expected! 8gb of ram, can run most games no problem. For those wondering, I have tested it on cs go and dota 2. Cs go, I get 200 FPS on high settings. Dota is easy to run. This pc is actually a great buy with the capability to upgrade as well. You won’t be disappointed at all.
customer_reviews.author: Donnie

customer_reviews.title: Computer looks nice but is completely worthless and a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Computer keeps blue screening or restarting over and over again. But at least it doesn’t crash when I play overwatch when I try to do anything on this computer. *Update 12/10/18* So I replaced a few parts and still blue screens, I think this was a pretty bad build. I could say it's allot like buying very expensive garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: READ THIS SKYTECH!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this computer for about three days and i am already having a s*** ton of issues, first problem: the audio is messed up, you cant really hear anyone talking that much. second problem: some games that i have are discolored or like blurry, it looks like if the screen was broken so tried my dads monitor, it was the same thing this PC cant run the games that i have properly. only some games work, its not my monitor that is broken it is the PC! i already tried playing the games that were messed up on my dads monitor, it still shows the same thing. PLEASE FIX THIS SKY TECH I BEG YOU!
customer_reviews.author: magdaleno campos

customer_reviews.title: Computer constantly stops working and displays BSoD (blue screen of death)
customer_reviews.text: I've had this computer for a week. Since the first day it has been freezing up, showing me a BSoD, and forcing me to manually restart it. This happens multiple times a day under different circumstances. One of the more common triggers of this is when I wake it up from sleep, it almost always gives me a BSoD. I've tried a few things to fix it but nothing seems to help, very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value, but wifi adapter is poo.
customer_reviews.text: Thing runs great at its price point. Went from gaming on a MAC to this and the difference is night and day. Would highly suggest buying a different wifi adapter with your order cause the one they give you is a POS to be honest.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worst Computer I Have Ever Bought
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband, he has only had it four days. He loves playing game such as Minecraft. He cannot play Minecraft on this computer. When he tries it lags, and then freezes. He has to do a total restart. This is supposed to be a gaming computer. I can play Minecraft on my 8-year-old HP. Tried chatting with support, the person was nice and friendly but told me I needed to speak to the manufacturer, and they are closed at 4:30 pm EST...REALLY!!! I am not happy at all! Tried calling Skytech and they are closed.
customer_reviews.author: Mama

customer_reviews.title: Defective 1st time, exchanged received after 2 weeks should have just returned to amazon.
customer_reviews.text: The ONLY reason I am giving this 2 stars is due to it being an adequate machine. Run games nicely. Here is what I had to deal with though. First machine would not boot up correctly, got it on left it on, called skytech tech support they had dled a new bios and installed it remotely, DID NOT START AGAIN. Shipped it back next day and 2 weeks later after having to get Amazon involved got a "upgraded SSD" replacement. The machine has USB ports and audio on top the audio work but not USB. NOT calling skytech again EVER! All thing considered I should have just returned it to amazon and bought someone elses product. HIGHLY DISSAPPOINTED!!
customer_reviews.author: Donny Mize

customer_reviews.title: Crashes.. ALL. the. time.
customer_reviews.text: Piece of GARBAGE. I’ve had this pc for a couple of months and might I say how awful it is. The NUMBER ONE con to this pc is how it CRASHES ALLLLLLLL THE TIMEEEEEE. No warning, it doesn’t overheat, it simply crashes on you ALLLLLLLLLLLLL THE TIME. Highly irritating, and a MASSIVE waste of money. This company has successfully made the worst pc ever:) good job!
customer_reviews.author: Miles k.

customer_reviews.title: Its a looser
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't have bluetooth. We needed a computer with bluetooth and thought a gaming computer would automatically have it. We called tech support and he said he would send us a bluetooth dangle at no charge. He sent us one but it didn't work. It was for windows 7 and wasn't compatible with windows 10. We bought another dangle ourselves that was supposed to work with windows 10, but it didn't work with this computer. We returned the computer and Amazon gave us a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: T. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Great system, good support team.
customer_reviews.text: Got off to a little bit of a rocky start, but I contacted support and they got back to me quickly with a solution. It turned out that the RAM stick had just become loose during shipping, and once I secured it, the system booted and worked fine. Everything is as described. Wi-Fi adapter is slow though, I would recommend a wired connection as opposed to using the adapter. All in all, a solid, good quality system.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend...
customer_reviews.text: From past experience, I can usually tell how a computer is going to run within the first 20 minutes of running it. This computer started and launched in a matter of minutes and I had all of my programs and game platforms downloaded and ready to launch within 15 minutes. I run a marketing business so I have multiple programs running at all times from design programs to multiple social media platforms etc. I'm also a huge gamer so I need a computer to perform. This computer holds up better then I expected! If you're looking for a computer that runs smooth, can handle multiple programs and run games with little effort, definitely check this one out!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Kidman

customer_reviews.title: This gaming pc is very good
customer_reviews.text: I really loved its performance, specially with games, of course. I can play whatever I want without having to low my graphic configurations. this pc delivered everything promised in terms of performance and etc.. I highly recommend this gaming pc to everyone, specially if its your first gaming pc, and even if you doesn't have any experiences with pcs. Thank you very much for the impressive support that comes with, I hope I can buy more stuff from you guys.
customer_reviews.author: Luanda123567

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pc for my grandson, and He loves it! He said that it can run 3d mark animation fps test! He loves this pc. His did come with internal lighting and external fan lighting. His average fps rate is around 90 - 200, depending on the game. Fortnite is at around 195, and the 3d mark animation is around 80-98. AWSOME! When i get a chance i will edit this with pictures and more information. But until then, Happy Gaming! [Ryzen & GTX 1050 Ti Edition] SkyTech Archangel Gaming Computer Desktop PC
customer_reviews.author: Sue LeJeune

customer_reviews.title: Great computer for your average gamer/general user!
customer_reviews.text: Best PC I've ever bought! Definitely would recommend this computer to anyone looking to buy one in this price range. Starts quick, runs super quite, haven't had any issues with it since I bought it 2 months ago. Haven't had to use the customer support yet but I've read lots of reviews before purchasing and they seem to have that part of the company really well taken care of. Will update in the future if I run into any problems but as of right now I hive it a 10 out of 10! Thanks for making a great computer!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy B

customer_reviews.title: The plug into the system is crappy!
customer_reviews.text: My kid was super excited to get this for his birthday. While downloading fortnite the plug was bumped and turned off the computer. Now it wont let him play it. It keeps showing an error message. When we tried to uninstall it shows an error...pretty disappointing. I called amazon Tech support for help and couldn't understand the lady who was trying to help us. She was getting frustrated, I was getting frustrated. So I told her nevermind. My kid just doesn't play fortnite on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amo

customer_reviews.title: Great computer
customer_reviews.text: Great computer, installed SWTOR and the default setting were on Ultra. And even running around with those setting in Fleet (Stormwind for those in WoW) it doesn't even lag. My only issue is I can't get my headset to work. Speakers will work fine, but any headphone I use I can't get to work even Bluetooth, still working on that issue, and yes I have tried many things to fix it. But the graphics are great, it's fast, and it's definitely worth the price, just some minor issues that I know can be fixed just not there yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awful for gaming and overpriced for the product.
customer_reviews.text: I hate this gaming pc. It is awful at running them, as it runs fortnite at all low settings around 70 fps. In other popular titles, it is the same. It runs apex legends and pubg at 40 fps on all low settings. I do not recommend buying this pc. It is the worst purchase I have ever made, and I wasted 600 dollars on it.
customer_reviews.author: Christi F

customer_reviews.title: Excellent computer for streaming!
customer_reviews.text: Let me start off by saying that I’m no pc tech savvy. But I’ve had this computer for almost a week and so far everything good, it runs Streamlabs good and using an el gato for streaming works really good with this computer. When I stream in stream labs my cpu is around 40% however I have a lot of stuff going on so that’s portably why it’s kind of high. Short story I would definitely recommend for anyone interested in console streaming, or starting to pc game. UPDATE: After almost 2 months computer still working perfect I can say that it’s well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jozz Angel

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with the whole experience.
customer_reviews.text: Finally replacing my custom gaming computer that I had built in 2011. Didn't feel like spending crazy money this time around, so I was looking for a middle of the road machine that I could upgrade. I settled on this machine. I ordered it late at night, the machine was here a day and a half later. Well packaged and protected. Opened it up and gave it an overall inspection. Tower is really nice. Machine was well put together and everything neatly installed. Not a single problem with Windows10 set-up. Machine runs absolutely silent. Very pleased with the over-all performance. Couldn't be happier at this price point. Prompt delivery, well packaged, no performance issues. Easy Five stars at this time.
customer_reviews.author: J.J.

customer_reviews.title: Great Mid Range PC!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing starter Gaming PC. I had an existing GTX 1050 TI and it fit perfectly. The area on the mother board will fit just about any graphics card. This PC is perfect for future upgrades as everything is extremely accessable. I had an SSD that I wanted to use as my boot disk, I plugged it in and turned on my PC for the first time and it automatically booted to the SSD I had attached and had every one of my files. Everything from the HDD to the processor is extremely easy to upgrade in this PC. But straight out of the box I was able to run GTA 5 at 45-50 FPS on High Settings!
customer_reviews.author: Lukas Schnieders

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my husband’s 2 year old cyberpower PC. I wasn’t expecting much of an upgrade, but the graphics are so much better. He’s a heavy gamer, mostly Final Fantast, World of Warcraft and Overwatch. On the highest graphics setting, he’s easily getting 60 fps with no lag and no issues. It’s fast, great graphics, and looks pretty cool (he says spaceship, I say storm trooper). It also came with the rainbow backlit keyboard and mouse. Both seem decent quality. For the price, this computer is way more than I expected!
customer_reviews.author: Christa Trullinger

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic customer support
customer_reviews.text: The computer was fine as a gaming PC for my teenage son. We purchased it a little over a year ago and with the proceeds from his summer job this year he decided to upgrade a number of components. This went smoothly until we started getting a message that windows 10 was unlicensed - it saw that the motherboard had been changed. We didn’t have the original packaging with a product key which would typically mean we were out of luck. But I contacted Skytech support - by email on a Sunday no less - and after one question they were able to confirm our purchase and provide an updated product key for windows - all within a day.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa T.

customer_reviews.title: Kid & Fortnite approved
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my 12 year old son. Like most kids his age, Fortnite is life. PC is easy to setup, cool design, and works great on "epic" settings. It is much larger than expected. You'll need a headphone/mic splitter to get their headsets to work
customer_reviews.author: Jason Alessio

customer_reviews.title: MISSSING PARTS
customer_reviews.text: My dream was to have a pc so I could finnaly play some games with my friends. So I got a job and I work for 3 months making minimum wage to buy this computer. I came with a different prossecer, a different graphics card and no ram. I paid for a ryzen processor and a GTX 1050 ti and I got a crappy low budget CPU, a bad graphics card. And it didn't even come with ram. On top of that, when I plugged the PC in to see if I could even play any games on it, it wouldn't even boot. Don't waste your money on this. It will come with missing parts.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy M.

customer_reviews.title: Impressed x's 2
customer_reviews.text: So my husband was actually gifted this computer by one of his gaming friends about 5-6 months ago. They're both hardcore gamers so they needed a system that could function with that. I actually fell in love with the computer myself and ended up having to replace mine due to online college courses (Microsoft Office needed). I've not had a single problem with the system. It's fast, holds a lot at once, and is truly worth the amount of money you spend. Plus the color is beautiful when lit up!
customer_reviews.author: Aly Hammonds

customer_reviews.title: THEY HAVE OUR MONEY AND COMPUTER AND WON’T RESPOND
customer_reviews.text: Bought the computer verified warranty info and was told that it’s covered for a year under warranty. Started having issues with it after only months was advised to return the computer. The company received it and verified receipt and then suddenly stopped responding. Been trying to reach them for weeks and they won’t respond, they have the money and the computer!! What is this?!?!
customer_reviews.author: shaylatwinkies

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: We are extremely happy with this computer. My husband and I were hard core gamers for years and previously had Alienware gaming computers, but they were almost a decade old and it was time for a replacement. The tower itself is gorgeous. We have the white case with blue lights (beautiful at night). We've had no negative experience at all with this machine. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Mia M Thurston

customer_reviews.title: Great Value & Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I expected to do upgrades because the price was low and figured there would be substandard components - WRONG! I do a lot of online gaming (Warcraft & other Blizzard games) and have had NO problems! System is quiet, responsive, and performs well. The only issue I had was the door on the front is not spring or latched, so opens on it's own. Minor issue, easily fixed with a piece of velcro. But this machine gives all I need and for the price is an exceptional value. Have not had to contact tech support, so can't give a rating in that regard.
customer_reviews.author: Tony R.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy. Awesome gaming PC!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered another gaming PC for a Christmas gift and it was a rip-off. We returned it and ordered this one right after. It was horrible because it was Christmas and it was a “main gift” but it all worked out when this one came in days later and was a hit! It held up to all the downloading/gaming going on and worked wonderfully. Our son still loves his computer! Well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Performs exceptionally well for a gaming pc at this price point.
customer_reviews.text: I write this after having had the pc for a couple of weeks. Pros: - Runs league of legends at 150+ FPS, even when multitasking - Very easy to setup out of the box (essentially just plug it in) - Easy to follow quick start guide - Comes with very good quality keyboard and mouse (considering they are included for free with a $600 pc) - Very low noise level. Cons: - none that I can see right now I would recommend this to anyone who’s looking for a gaming pc under $750.
customer_reviews.author: notrabe

customer_reviews.title: Great PC! Super fast!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 10 year old sons birthday as he's an avid gamer and also would be doing virtual learning this year. Ive built many PCs and for the included components it would have been about same amount of money as me doing it. Fired right up, did all the Windows updates and have been off and running since! If you are gaming make sure you optimize the video card settings. Super happy with it and would order another in a heartbeat!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Stepp

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Did not work right ever stopped working completely after an hour or two product support never answered number provided. The most disappointing Christmas present I have ever given and I was so excited about it. Ordered replacement which had the exact same problem. Awful experience.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Best Rig Excellent Service
customer_reviews.text: Experienced the best customer service along with a awesome computer that is a power house I was beyond tempted to build my own by buying my own parts and bla bla bla but this is the best computer I have ever owned along with a Top Notch Customer Experience from Skytech Gaming whose support staff is absolutely amazing I am over joyed on my purchase and plan on buying another computer from them :) :)
customer_reviews.author: That one guy

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup, arrived quickly, works well
customer_reviews.text: Hadn't bought a computer in many moons, and needed something that could run simpler games with mods (nothing super graphics-heavy) as well as for the usual internet things- Skype, facebook, spotify, etc. This desktop definitely meets my needs and is SUPER quiet, which is awesome! It arrived in working condition and setup was easy as pie.
customer_reviews.author: Em Jane

customer_reviews.title: Great PC upgrade
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to replace a crappy laptop I was using for a few years, and so far it works very well. Surprisingly lightweight for its size. Keep in mind this PC is configured in a basic way, with several USB ports (which should be adequate for most needs), but only 1 HDMI output. It will take some settings configuration to achieve audio out from HDMI simultaneously with line out (as per my needs). I do not use this for gaming so I cannot comment on quality of gameplay specs - I primarily use this for internet, streaming, and audio applications and so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy K.

customer_reviews.title: It delivers
customer_reviews.text: I bought this computer and wasn't sure what to expect but, i love it. I can play all my games on high or ultra settings and still get good frames. I can stream on twitch and it runs with ease. If you're looking for a computer that won't cost an arm and leg and will still run like a true gaming pc I would recommend it. I mainly use it for overwatch and world of warcraft. I run WoW on 10 with 150% resolution and get 40-60fps. If i run it on lower settings i can get a stupid amoubt of frames but i can raid, dungeon, and pvo, go into highky populated areas, and be smooth as butter.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Seinfeld

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: First pc arrived doa. Second arrived with a defective dvd drive. How many do they have to ship to get you one that works?
customer_reviews.author: Alex Roberson

customer_reviews.title: Good core, peripherals are junk
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son. It was a huge upgrade from his old computer. Alas, shortly after it arrived, keys started not working. We contacted tech support and they replied, but in the meantime, the keyboard started working again. So we waited. Sure enough, a week or so later, the keyboard started acting up. This time, when I contacted tech support, nothing. Zilch. No reply. We ended up getting a new keyboard on our own. They aren't that expensive. Just sad that it isn't the light-up style the computer came with.
customer_reviews.author: Wolfeye

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: The computer would not run for more than a couple minutes and then would give error messages or restart. VERY FRUSTRATING!! We did the fixes the seller recommended but nothing helped. The seller was great about taking it back and refunding our money right away.
customer_reviews.author: G Nahmens

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but returned it! 😕
customer_reviews.text: Loved this computer....it didn’t love me back. Kept having critical errors and the system would shut down. Customer service was very slow to respond. Decided to send it back to Amazon. Got an HP Omen instead, zero problems.
customer_reviews.author: BGeezie

customer_reviews.title: Girlfriend loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to get my girlfriend a starter gaming desktop and came across this one. Based on the specs, it should be able to play most games at high and ultra settings when fully clocked. She only wants it for Netflix and the occasional League of Legends so this was perfect. Tech support from Amazon was a joke -- but it's not really Skytech's fault. The computer was packed very nicely and foamed up very snug for the internal parts. There were some people complaining about the parts not being the same as what's shown in the listing image, but mine came standard so you might want to check with who you're buying it from.
customer_reviews.author: IG: @mistermajestic

customer_reviews.title: Who would of thought.....
customer_reviews.text: This computer is best for its value. I Love how sleek it looks and very quiet to run. I added IO Bit malware defrag and antivirus and it works just fine. The only issue I ran into was having to order two brand new 8gb DDR4 to run my OBS with it having frames drop and being notified how many times it dropped during streaming. I order Ballistic LT Sports at $77 a pair to run at double what it was lagging at.(8GB) All In all a good computer and no complaints, Skytech customer support has been excellent and fast in response to any questions you may have about their products or recommended upgrades
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Amazing service
customer_reviews.text: Great PC. Best customer service I've ever witnessed. I ordered 2 from Amazon. One had a faulty ram stick and another had a faulty processor fan. Amazon refused to repair them but skytech sent replacement ram and fan assembly and even included thermal paste. Both PC's still going strong no lag no problems for almost a couple months shy of a year now. If you buy a PC. But skytech if you buy a skytech PC but it from skytech not Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: A good system for 1080P gaming, at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this system is the best computer I’ve ever purchased. This system will handle newer games at 1080P and medium graphics settings.MMO’s like WoW and SWTOR I can play at 4K and high if not ultra settings in most cases. It isn’t a VR system or a professional video editing rig or anything like that. One thing I’d like to see changed for this system; is 16gigs of RAM versus the 8 gigs this system comes with. To sum up, if you want the best of the best, this system isn’t for you. However, if you want a great deal for playing games at 1080P, you’re in the right place.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Nolen

customer_reviews.title: Nice computer for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's really beautiful, and we bought a keyboard and mouse to match which makes it even more striking. It was easy to set up and no significant technical issues. If I had a complaint, it would be that even tho this is a gaming computer with pretty good specs, it still can be little slow with my Sims 4. However, my daughter has downloaded a ton of mods and it hasn't crashed yet, which is more than I can say for the gaming laptop we used to have
customer_reviews.author: Ann Weindel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent beginner's gaming pc
customer_reviews.text: Well, I bought this for my son who has been wanting to build a gaming PC for quite some time. After doing alot of searching for parts, I decided for him to start out on a pre-built that has the ability to be upgraded. Is this the top of the line machine? No, but it is a great intro machine, with plenty of upgrades that can be done to it. I set it up pretty easily, and it is a very quiet machine, which is nice. Not a big selling point, but this tower actually has a cd/DVD drive in it, which is pretty rare these days. All in all, it seems to be a great machine for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mdfowler8091

customer_reviews.title: Happy!
customer_reviews.text: Really loving this computer. I am a very casual gamer so I wasn't looking for anything crazy, but I am very pleased with this computer. It runs so quietly. The mouse and keyboard that it comes with are also really nice bonuses. Also, it was easy to set up and start using.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia P

customer_reviews.title: BIGGEST BANG FOR YOUR BUCK!
customer_reviews.text: I usually build my own pc desktops. As I was browsing through computer parts, I happened across the SkyTech Archangel pc and was stunned to see this desktop was an even better value than purchasing each part alone. Once it arrived, I wasn't disappointed in the least. It's been months and I have yet to come across an problem or error. I have been able to play most all current gen games on max graphic setting, such as Divinity 2, Vermintide 2, Farcry 5, Skyrim, and Elderscrolls online to name a few. As always do your own research... but I'm totally and amazingly satisfied for this inexpensive yet powerful pc.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Kole

customer_reviews.title: Bumpy start
customer_reviews.text: The computer is extremely quiet and seems to be running well. I would have given 5 stars but when it arrived I had to plug in the hard drive and stayed on tech support for an hour trying to figure out why it would not boot up. My tech savvy brother in law cane over and got it going. For the regular Joe like me it would probably have been enough to make them lose their minds and box it up and send it back. However I understand things happen sometimes so I'm not upset. Computer looks great and live the keyboard and mouse I didn't expect to get.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Nealey

customer_reviews.title: Nice Gaming PC at Affordable Price Point
customer_reviews.text: The Sky Tech Archangel PC is performing really well. It was purchased at a very reasonable cost (on sale at Amazon) for the purpose of installing the new Borderlands 3 PC download. So far, so good. It is a very quiet machine and would probably serve well as a general purpose desktop (video editing, etc). I'm sure there's a lot faster and capable gaming machines (costing hundreds more), but with 8 gigs of ram and a decent processor, it is working fine.
customer_reviews.author: President Charley

customer_reviews.title: But wait, there's more!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know this, but mine came with a keyboard and mouse, which I was desperately in need of. The PC is a bit larger than I had imagined, but it still fits nicely in my room. It's beautiful and powerful. I love it so far! The only upgrade I could foresee wanting in the future is an SSD drive, but since this is being used as my gaming PC, I feel more comfortable with the heft Terra Drive. I had a friend who works in the IT field professionally and said that this was an incredible machine for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin J.

customer_reviews.title: No Support
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely do not get this tower if you’re looking to game, do spreadsheets, or even try and turn it on. This tower was defective from day one, but the company would not accept my return. I was told it is a working machine; it is after I hard reset it for about sixty minutes. zero support from the company I purchased it from, does not work. There may be something wrong with my specific tower, but they refuse to fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Good delivery,  problems right out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: Good delivery time, but nothing but problems so far.. can game but blue screen codes of all kinds if I try to download or go idle.. will fix rating depending on how they handle this
customer_reviews.author: MR

customer_reviews.title: This should be a 'welcome' pc
customer_reviews.text: If you buy this thinking it will be long term, you're gonna be disappointed. I bought this so I had a constantly working platform to build on. I'd switch the RAM and CPU one week, then the GPU, then the mobo, then the PSU, and vwala, completely separate PC that I learned with ease. And? Still got a second PC. But my goals from the start, were never to have this thing for a long time. It's outdated, it doesn't perform as good as your buddy who got you into PC. It's a great start, but nothing more.
customer_reviews.author: Devyn

customer_reviews.title: Everything's is great, but please check the windows activation before selling.
customer_reviews.text: I waited to write my review until about a week of use and everything is great. It runs the games I want to play and is at a great price. The only hickup I had is I had to activate the copy of windows that it came with. I called customer support and immediately got the problem fixed. Great price, great product. I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Crisostomo

customer_reviews.title: Theirs almost no noise and it can last long period times for gaming is also able to be upgraded.
customer_reviews.text: For a beginning pc you are definitely going to be satisfied with the buy and your moneys worth.i can easily run any game on max settings at 60fps and more.
customer_reviews.author: Liliana

customer_reviews.title: Great product, except for the wireless adaptor
customer_reviews.text: The price, shipping, and everything else is great. Good box for the money, performs well. My only complaint is with the wireless adaptor (TP-Link) included with the computer -- the adaptor failed approximately 10 minutes after installation and the drivers/software included with the TP-link wireless are bad - installation was buggy, uninstall crashes the operating system, reinstall is even worse... and the adaptor itself apparently failed. If I were the company selling this computer I would either a) go with a different vendor (I went with Linksys, which works fine), or b) not include it in the box, but recommend it on purchase. otherwise, I am very happy with everything else and quite pleased with the service.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Curewitz

customer_reviews.title: Very nice computer for a very nice price!
customer_reviews.text: Received the computer this morning, and set up was extremely smooth. Everything was exactly as advertised. Had a very minor issue with sound not playing, but was able to fix it in minutes without having to contact support, and now sound works just fine. I don't play super demanding games, but the games I do play run have all run very smooth with a great frame rate. Very satisfied with this computer so far and will look to Skytech the next time I'm in the market for a computer. (Couldn't rate tech support because I haven't had to contact them yet. Many other reviewers had nice things to say about them though.)
customer_reviews.author: claybmt

customer_reviews.title: Older CPU
customer_reviews.text: Really should get one of these with a newer cpu for I will have to replace this in a year or so to keep up with newer games I also warn that you will probably want more ram this model comes with 8 GB ram and an extra 4 GB ram on graphics card. Other then that its performance is very nice, runs smooth, Graphics card is very good. lights are cool haven't tried to change color but pretty sure description states its possible. there is some noise kind of noticable but dose not bother me during game play.
customer_reviews.author: danielle

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy only lasts a couple months
customer_reviews.text: GARBAGE. Bought 2 and both stopped powering on. First one after 1 month and the second after 4 months
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was good the first month
customer_reviews.text: Update: after having this PC for 10 months, it’s not worth it, you’ll have to spend 200-300 more dollars upgrading because as is, the pc isn’t really functional for any games. I’ve tried League of Legends, COD, hearthstone, APEX, Valorant and GTA games
customer_reviews.author: Monica Canjura

customer_reviews.title: Works well enough for my purposes!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this during the great Coronavirus pre-built shortage of 2020. Honestly, not the best bang for your buck in 2020, but I needed a computer and didn't feeling like building one. Slow CPU and needs more ram, this won't really work for next gen games without serious upgrades, but for playing through my extensive steam backlog (+ loads of Dauntless) and general web surfing, I have no complaints thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole-Angela

customer_reviews.title: sweet comp
customer_reviews.text: So far been a dream for my boy. its cool looking in real life, One thing make sure you hook your monitor up to the right plug way on the bottom. I went to walmart three times buying cords and new monitors wondering why i dont get a picture? The main board on the back does not work until I got info it was the connection way on bottom if you know what i mean.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Super happy with my gaming rig
customer_reviews.text: I moved from a HP laptop to this unit. I looked at 40+ computers on Amazon, Walmart and BestBuy before settling on this one. I mainly play Overwatch, Runescape and Magic online. The latter two games don't require much resources, but my Overwatch games are smooth. The computer can handle more FPS than my monitor so I won't include my precise specs.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard C. Richardson

customer_reviews.title: BLUE SCREEN DEATH
customer_reviews.text: While at first the computer seemed fine, few hours into any game I keep getting mem management blue screen of death. I naturally upgraded to 16GB by adding another 8GB stick. but it still does this. it does recover from the fault, but every game every day depending how long you play, I get this screen. I might add that I literally have 1 game installed on a 1tb hard drive and nothing else but what came factory installed, so there is no reason for this.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Hillery

customer_reviews.title: Great starter pc!
customer_reviews.text: When I got it all set up, I was able to run GTA V 30fps 1080 medium high settings and Payday 2 1080 60fps medium settings. Its a good starting conputer for someone too afraid to build one from scratch. Thats what I wanted. Swapped out the GPU to a EVGA 1070 Black, the CPU to a Ryzen 5 2600 (not X, the board doesn't support overclocking), and another stick of 8gb RAM. After that, It ran everything great! I'm happy with my purchase. I reccomend this pc to anyone that doesn't want to go all in on their first pc and just test the waters.
customer_reviews.author: Onyx

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas present for my son who is big into gaming. Before I bought it, I brought the specs to a friend of mine who builds and sells gaming computers. This friend told me he couldn't beat the price for the same specs. We had no problems setting it up, and my son says it works great even on games that his old computer would struggle with. It's not top of the line, but it definitely exceeded my expectations for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Allison

customer_reviews.title: Not strong enough to stream and game
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet, I don’t even hear it at all... lots of USB ports which is awesome.. BUT it’s not strong enough for gaming and streaming... I can only use it to stream.. the first week it was fast and worked great and now it has slowed down a bit and takes a little while to load things up after only a month... if you want to stream and play games, THIS IS NOT POWERFUL ENOUGH! But it does the job streaming wise
customer_reviews.author: niki

customer_reviews.title: Needs more Ram
customer_reviews.text: Gonna be honest the graphics card isn't great and the ram is kinda meh. I upgraded the Ram, put in a SSD and its running way better. Will be upgrading the Graphics card in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: DMC

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product way better then cyberpower
customer_reviews.text: This has been the best computer we have recieved. We have tried several different gaming computers and by far this one exceeds our expectations. I will never buy from cyber power again. Cyber powers customer service was horrible but skytech was absolutely perfect. They helped with any issues quickly. I will definitely buy from them again. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: marjorie wells

customer_reviews.title: Technical issues
customer_reviews.text: I was upset as soon as I opened the box and started my desktop it went into bios mode instead of booting windows 10, come to find out one of the cables that connects to the hard was missing as if some one tampered with it. I had to replace that cable because it was missing from the mother board. Make sure all the hardware is in the desktop.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Cabrera

customer_reviews.title: Versatile Computer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this computer as a gift for my gamer partner. He uses steam and plays online co-op games. This computer is perfect for everything he needs. I personally use the computer for school. It sits in our living room, and does not distract from our TV. Also, to be honest, our dog has knocked the tower over multiple times and no issues have occurred. Would suggest this item.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor M.

customer_reviews.title: A Gift For My Husband
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this computer for my husband as a gift. Overall this computer is of high quality for the price. However, there are a couple of reasons I am giving it 4 stars. The computer does not have WiFi capabilities but does come with a USB device adapter from tp-link that allows you to connect your computer to WiFi. During the initial set up, the monitor as difficult to hook up to the computer and took a bit of trouble shooting (this may have been due to the monitor however). My husband has been very happy with this computer so far and would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Miller

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a gadget head by any means, but this is one amazing machine! I had to buy something with a good processor and good video in order to do some graphic design work, so I figured a gaming computer was my best bet. Best decision I ever made on a computer. This thing is blazing fast, and absurdly quiet. You can lean down next to the fan and still not hear it running. I can't recommend this enough.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you have a DVI or a HDMI cord!
customer_reviews.text: I received the product and it took me about a couple of hours if I remember correctly to finish setting the computer up. The reason why it might have possibly took me hours was because I didn't know that it needed a DVI or HDMI cord. I though it used a VGA cord. Eventually I found out and the set up was completed. I turned the computer on and it ran well as I expected it to. So I rate it a five out of five for it's performance and looks. It's a beautiful piece of hardware.
customer_reviews.author: TessMK

customer_reviews.title: satisfaction! (a little delayed)
customer_reviews.text: We are happy with the product, it just took a while to get to that point. Ordered one originally that had a defect. While it is hard to get through to customer service anywhere in pandemic times, when we finally got through, they were quick to diagnose the problem, we sent it back, reordered and got a replacement that is up and running with no issues
customer_reviews.author: BugFan

customer_reviews.title: Great computer
customer_reviews.text: Great computer. The tower is huge. The fan is very quiet. My son plays games like League of Kegends, Runescape and Roblox. He has not had any issues with those games. I love the gaming keyboard and mouse that is included. Both have bright colors that constantly change. My son is very happy with his Christmas present.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Loving it!
customer_reviews.text: So, I only bought this a few days ago and I'm already loving it. It's way faster than my laptop and I can actually play games on here if I so desired. The only problem I've had, and it's not a big deal since I already had one, is that the scroll wheel on the mouse didn't work. Again, that really isn't an issue though since I had bought one awhile back. All in all completely satisfied and I would highly recommend this to others.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Good little computer
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had got the next step up. To late now right. Any way it’s good for Minecraft. Ark it’s decent except when you want to do custom paints then omg you crash does much. Or maybe that’s a ark issues and not so much of a pc issue 🤷‍♀️It loads super quick. Has a DVD burner if anyone still gets into dvds. :) I
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: The computer itself is fine, my big problem is with the company that ...
customer_reviews.text: The computer itself is fine, my big problem is with the company that sent the computer in the first place. It arrived on time, but when I opened the case to take out the protector my video card was just dangling and not even really hooked up all the way. I had to hook it up and secure it with a zip tie. The lack of quality control kind of frustrating for the price that you pay. Otherwise the computer is fine and works great, just know you might not get the best care taken.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Good PC for the price, Better Customer Service than expected
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this PC for myself to use for light to moderate gaming. Well within the first month the graphics card started to crap out. I contacted tech support via email and got a very quick response and within a weeks time of emailing daily back and forth troubleshooting the issue they replaced the graphics card and the pc has been up and running since with no issues. Noise level is almost non existant and the pc handles every single game that I play from the Batman Arkum series to WoW. Good pc, Excellent customer service. Overall good experience will definitely buy another from this company in the foreseeable future.
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: Great budget computer
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this computer for over a year now and have no complaints. It has run flawlessly since day 1. I mainly play World of Warcraft and run programs like Pro Tools. This thing is MASSIVE. I can’t understate how large this case is. Prepare to have some space for this baby to sit in.
customer_reviews.author: Trevith Driscoll

customer_reviews.title: An impressive pleasure...
customer_reviews.text: The video card in my older ASUS machine began to fail, preventing game play. I searched and searched, coming across Sky Tech products on Amazon. I compared and contrasted, and eventually went to Sky Tech's web site. Based on what I read, I thought I was making a good decision. I have been extremely happy with the speed and quality of the pc; the video rendering has been spot on too. AND? It's very quiet, I don't even know it's on.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Doty

customer_reviews.title: its trash
customer_reviews.text: constant crashes, works well for videos and then craps out whenever i play games. not buying again
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing!
customer_reviews.text: You want a great gaming computer? Look no further, I'm an upcoming YouTuber, I can easily play a variety of games, have three different programs running and hook up a bunch of recording equipment easily. What's even better, tech support, they understand their product inside and out. I've go no complaints here, it's silent, fast and reliable. It also has a DVD port.
customer_reviews.author: Atsu-Waffles

customer_reviews.title: Great entry level gaming computer!
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this computer for my Daughter to play Fortnight, Sims 4, and WOW. It only came with 8gb of Ram but performed really good. The boot up time was a little slow but I attribute that to it having an optical drive. I put another 8gb of Ram in it and it is noticeably faster. I bought the extra ram cheaper than I could get the 16gb model so that's not really a failing of the computer itself as I knew what I was buying. For entry level gaming I'd give this system an A-.
customer_reviews.author: catwoman

customer_reviews.title: Great gaming PC for the price! ❤️
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this system for powerful programs I use for work. The system arrived carefully packaged. Setup was a breeze. The only complaint I have is when powered ON the fan boots a bit loudly. However, performance is amazing for what I do as well as gaming. The Os processes quite swiftly and it doesn't look as ugly as most describe it. 😊💕🐝 I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Bree

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: I've bought this computer twice an bothe times they were broken Don't wast your money on this
customer_reviews.author: Noah

customer_reviews.title: The RAM sucks
customer_reviews.text: This product is incredibly affordable and delivers great power for the price versus spec. What sucks is that I'm only about four months into ownership and the single RAM stick inside the machine is already failing. If it weren't for that, this would be a 5-star buy.
customer_reviews.author: Eli G.

customer_reviews.title: My son loves this computer
customer_reviews.text: My 13 year old son loves this computer. It plays all his games well. I was nervous about the shipping, but everything worked fine after unpacking setting everything up. However, it was a little stressful removing the packaging around the video card. You have to be very delicate because the packaging snags on everything.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for graphic design
customer_reviews.text: Runs my graphic design and 3D modeling software like a dream. I can run all my programs at full potential with no lag (Photoshop, Fusion 360, etc). My main purpose for buying this PC was for design and editing purposes, but I do some gaming every once in a while. I've had no problems with any of my games, although I am not running anything intensive (I mostly play ps2 emulations) so I can't comment on the performance for those. Surprisingly quiet for it's size, I hardly notice any noise. I'll note that it's very cool aesthetically too.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanie Rosenblum

customer_reviews.title: I usually don't write these reviews....
customer_reviews.text: I am in that group that thinks that many reviews are fake or coerced. But last week I had a quick need for a gaming computer. You could even say it was an unnecessary indulgence on my behalf. I looked at all of my options and was surprised to find that this Skytech computer checked all of the boxes. Then the price sold it. I didn't feel angst over my guilty indulgence. After a day and a half, it arrived at my home and I began to feel relief. Actually I felt that it wasn't an indulgence but a WISE move on my behalf!
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty and seems to work well
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband's birthday. He hasn't voiced any dissatisfaction about it . The only thing I don't like about it is that the fan(s) are noisy. But perhaps that's because it has to work hard keeping it cool with today's high tech games.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah Jayne

customer_reviews.title: Great gaming PC
customer_reviews.text: The set-up went fairly smooth. Love that this includes a gaming mouse and lightup keyboard. My grandson thinks the blue light is super cool..My roomate hooked everything up and had to call tech support on Xmas day...they called back in less than 5 minutes and did a follow up call and email 2 hours later...wow...thats a 5 star rating!!!
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: A VERY DECENT GAMING PC FOR IT'S CHEAP PRICE
customer_reviews.text: I knokw what y'all are gonna say "You can pay $750 to build your own pc with specs that are much higher than that" Ok, but some people don't have time to build cuz we busy with work or whatever and for me this is the very decent pre built pc. I can play League of Legends on this with very high graphics on 180-200 fps and I can stream on discord on this too so you know it's a little fast but just so you know the only downside it it's a Ryzen 3 so having more processes than gaming and streaming at the same time will make this computer barely run those so bare that in mind.
customer_reviews.author: Cj

customer_reviews.title: Amazing offer!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a second one because the price was right, the tower looks awesome, it's very quiet with the right settings, there's a cool color changing fan inside, AND it comes with a color changing keyboard and mouse. Great deal!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dulce De Leche

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: It works like a dream! I've never had a PC this good! The graphics and processing speeds are amazing! The only gripes I have with it is that it's fans are loud and it's really big but it's an amazing budget PC. I would absolutely recommend. NB: this is a review by my 9-year old gamer who owns it
customer_reviews.author: Momof3

customer_reviews.title: Blue screen error
customer_reviews.text: I have the blue screen error every now and then I don't really play much but for the money I guess its good ass long as you don't exceed excessive amount of playing cuss you will get errors on it. 3 Stars cuss it is good for the money paid but wont make your gaming dreams come true. Depends what games you play I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Tespys

product_meta.title: [Ryzen & GTX 1050 Ti Edition] SkyTech Archangel Gaming Computer Desktop PC Ryzen 1200 3.1GHz Quad-Core, GTX 1050 Ti 4GB, 8GB DDR4 2400, 1TB HDD, 24X DVD, Wi-Fi USB, Windows 10 Home 64-bit
product_meta.description: Why settle for mediocrity? Leap forward into SkyTech Archangel Ryzen series with the newest architectures from AMD and Nvidia. Powered by an AMD Ryzen 1200 Chipset, this unlocked quad-core delivers great performance with a base speed of 3. 1 Ghz. SkyTech Archangel delivers the best price performance value gaming rig in the market. SkyTech Archangel brings you immersive graphics that is powered by Nvidia GTX 1050 Ti 4GB. This rig is optimized for HD / 1080P gaming. Partnered with G. Skill DDR4 2400 MHz memory, your PC will be performing at a much faster speed with higher FPS in games compared to other gaming brands. In games we trust is our motto, and we deliver! Optimized Gaming at 1080p resolution. Newest Ryzen Engine Chipset from AMD Powerful Nvidia Geforce GTX 1050 Ti 4GB Graphics Powerful Multi-Thread / Application Games tested at 1080P Shadow of Mordor: Average 40-60 FPS Ultra Settings Battlefield 1: 50-90 FPS Ultra Setting Star Wars BattleFront: 50-75 FPS Ultra Settings Far Cry Primal: 50-60 FPS High Settings GTA V: 50-75 FPS Very High Settings OverWatch: 64-90 FPS Specification Processor: AMD Ryzen Unlocked 1200 3. 1 Ghz Quad-Core Processor (3. 4 Ghz Turbo) Motherboard: ASRock A320M AM4 mATX Video Card: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1050 Ti 4GB Video Card (Brand varies) Memory: 8GB DDR4 2400 Gaming Memory Power Supply: 500 Watt 80 PLUS Certified Power Supply HDD: 1TB 7200 RPM Hard Drive Operating System: Microsoft Windows 10 Home 64-bit

✔ Nvidia GeForce GTX 1050 Ti 4GB Video Card | 8GB DDR4 2400 Gaming Memory | Windows 10 Home 64-bit
✔ Wi-Fi Ready | No bloatware | 1 x Dual-link DVI, 1 x DisplayPort (version 1.4), 1 x HDMI | 9 x USB (4 X USB 2.0; 5 X USB3.0)
✔ Power by 80 Plus Certified 500 Watt Power Supply | Free Gaming Keyboard & Mouse | Monitor Not included
